item.title: CV
item.description: What is this? The PDF file for my CV, for those who are not into the web-version? Here it is Previous Next     Page: /

item.title: About
item.description: As a lifelong learner, I am always eager to embark on new learning journeys. My passion for technology and innovation has led me to specialize in the fields of IoT, streaming, and Machine Learning. I strongly believe in the power of discipline and consistent effort to achieve great results. Being a part of this fast-paced digital era is truly exhilarating as I get to witness how the impossible becomes possible every day.
